TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpHandler

summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 为使用自定义 HTTP 处理程序同步处理 HTTP Web 请求而实现的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to synchronously process HTTP Web requests using custom HTTP handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以编写自定义 HTTP 处理程序来处理任何公共语言规范中的特定的、预定义类型的 HTTP 请求 (符合 CLS) 兼容的语言。You can write custom HTTP handlers to process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests in any Common Language Specification (CLS) compliant language. 在类中定义的可执行代码 `HttpHandler` （而不是传统的 ASP 或 ASP.NET 网页）对这些特定请求做出响应。Executable code defined in the `HttpHandler` classes, rather than conventional ASP or ASP.NET Web pages, responds to these specific requests. HTTP 处理程序为您提供了一种与 IIS Web 服务器的低级请求和响应服务交互的方法，并提供了与 ISAPI 扩展相同的功能，但具有更简单的编程模型。HTTP handlers give you a means of interacting with the low-level request and response services of the IIS Web server and provide functionality much like ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model. 如果处理程序将访问会话状态值，则它必须实现 接口 (不) 方法的标记接口。If your handler will access session state values, it must implement the interface (a marker interface with no methods).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReusable As Boolean
public: property bool IsReusable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示其他请求是否可以使用 实例。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the instance.

value.span: 如果 实例可再次使用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is reusable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将属性显式设置 为 `true` 或， `false` 通过提供的代码重写 属性访问器 (getter) 。You explicitly set the property to `true` or `false` by code you provide that overrides the property accessor (getter). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将四行文本写入 HTTP 输出流，以响应名为 handler 的页的客户端请求。The following code example writes four lines of text to the HTTP output stream in response to a client request for a page named handler.aspx. 处理程序 .aspx 的所有请求均由 `MyHttpHandler` `HandlerExample` 程序集 HandlerTest.dll 中包含的命名空间中的类提供服务。All requests for handler.aspx are serviced by the `MyHttpHandler` class in the namespace `HandlerExample` contained in the assembly HandlerTest.dll. [!code-csharp[Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: context
param.span: 对象，该对象提供对用于为 HTTP 请求提供服务的内部服务器对象（如 、、 和 ）的引用。

span.span: An object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, , , , and ) used to service HTTP requests.

summary.span: 通过实现 接口的自定义 启用 HTTP Web 请求的处理。

span.span: Enables processing of HTTP Web requests by a custom that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将自定义 `HttpHandler` 代码放在 虚拟方法中，如 "示例" 部分所示。Place your custom `HttpHandler` code in the virtual method, as shown in the Examples section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将四行文本写入 HTTP 输出流，以响应名为 handler 的页的客户端请求。The following code example writes four lines of text to the HTTP output stream in response to a client request for a page named handler.aspx. 处理程序 .aspx 的所有请求均由 `MyHttpHandler` `HandlerExample` 程序集 HandlerTest.dll 中包含的命名空间中的类提供服务。All requests for handler.aspx are serviced by the `MyHttpHandler` class in the namespace `HandlerExample` contained in the assembly HandlerTest.dll. [!code-csharp[Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
